name: Seismo
description:
Entry into Trijam 158 - "Force of Nature"

This building is battling a deadly earthquake! Shift each floor left/right to keep the building from falling down for 30 turns.

Click Arrows to shift floors of the building left/right.

Earthquakes will shift the floors left/right each turn! Just look for the floating circles and arrows. After your move, each floor will shift based upon the arrows above - floors are only affected by markers which line up with rooms of the same colour.

You win the game if you can survive 30 turns!

Notes:

The game was supposed to take only 3 hours to make but took closer to 6 - There was so much I wanted to add, including an increasing level of difficulty with more quakes as time goes on. There are also a few sprites which ended up being unused, including destruction particles and building details.

Credits:

https://www.1001fonts.com/fluoxetine-font.html

Font: Yumaro by "Monoco Type Foundry"

https://www.1001fonts.com/yumaro-font.html

Music: Ruined City by "Cleyton Kauffman"

https://opengameart.org/content/ruined-city-theme

Sounds: "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" by Juhani Junkala

Sprites/Game - Made in Unity by Toby Kellaway
